compliancy.name: DISA STIG Solaris 10 SPARC
compliancy.title: U.S. DISA Security Technical Implementation Guides

line-item.name: GEN005525
line-item.description: The SSH client must not permit GSSAPI authentication unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN001410
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file (or equivalent) must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN005523
line-item.description: The SSH private host key files must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005522
line-item.description: The SSH public host key files must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005521
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must restrict login ability to specific users and/or groups.

line-item.name: GEN003619
line-item.description: The system must not be configured for network bridging.

line-item.name: GEN006040
line-item.description: The system must not have any peer-to-peer file-sharing application installed.

line-item.name: GEN005524
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not permit GSSAPI authentication unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN002340
line-item.description: Audio devices must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00110
line-item.description: The /etc/security/audit_user file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002460
line-item.description: The system must be checked weekly for unauthorized setgid files, as well as, unauthorized modification to authorized setgid files.

line-item.name: GEN005320
line-item.description: The snmpd.conf file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005450
line-item.description: The system must use a remote syslog server (log host).

line-item.name: GEN004220
line-item.description: Administrative accounts must not run a web browser, except as needed for local service administration.

line-item.name: GEN005750
line-item.description: The NFS export configuration file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN002330
line-item.description: Audio devices must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN003440
line-item.description: "At" jobs must not set the umask to a value less restrictive than 077.

line-item.name: GEN003110
line-item.description: Cron and crontab directories must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN005140
line-item.description: Any active TFTP daemon must be authorized and approved in the system accreditation package.

line-item.name: GEN000640
line-item.description: The system must require passwords to contain at least one special character.

line-item.name: GEN001240
line-item.description: System files, programs, and directories must be group-owned by a system group.

line-item.name: GEN006260
line-item.description: The /etc/news/hosts.nntp (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001560
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in user's home directories must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN006340
line-item.description: Files in /etc/news must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000480
line-item.description: The delay between login prompts following a failed login attempt must be at least 4 seconds.

line-item.name: GEN001480
line-item.description: All users' home directories must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001320
line-item.description: NIS/NIS+/yp files must be owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00660
line-item.description: The physical devices must not be assigned to non-global zones.

line-item.name: GEN003220
line-item.description: Cron programs must not set the umask to a value less restrictive than 077.

line-item.name: GEN006290
line-item.description: The /etc/news/hosts.nntp.nolimit file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN004880
line-item.description: The ftpusers file must exist.

line-item.name: GEN004920
line-item.description: The ftpusers file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001740
line-item.description: All global initialization files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN004660
line-item.description: The SMTP service must not have the EXPN feature active.

line-item.name: GEN001660
line-item.description: All system start-up files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN003160
line-item.description: Cron logging must be implemented.

line-item.name: GEN000540
line-item.description: Users must not be able to change passwords more than once every 24 hours.

line-item.name: GEN000240
line-item.description: The system clock must be synchronized to an authoritative DoD time source.

line-item.name: GEN001980
line-item.description: The .rhosts, .shosts, hosts.equiv, shosts.equiv, /etc/passwd, /etc/shadow, and/or /etc/group files must not contain a plus (+) without defining entries for NIS+ netgroups.

line-item.name: GEN006460
line-item.description: Any NIS+ server must be operating at security level 2.

line-item.name: GEN004390
line-item.description: The alias file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN003835
line-item.description: The rlogind service must not be installed.

line-item.name: GEN000242
line-item.description: The system must use at least two time sources for clock synchronization.

line-item.name: GEN003830
line-item.description: The rlogind service must not be running.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00640
line-item.description: The limitpriv zone option must be set to the vendor default or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000790
line-item.description: The system must prevent the use of dictionary words for passwords.

line-item.name: GEN007840
line-item.description: The DHCP client must be disabled if not needed.

line-item.name: GEN004710
line-item.description: Mail relaying must be restricted.

line-item.name: GEN008600
line-item.description: The system must be configured to only boot from the system boot device.

line-item.name: GEN003060
line-item.description: Default system accounts (with the exception of root) must not be listed in the cron.allow file or must be included in the cron.deny file, if cron.allow does not exist.

line-item.name: GEN004950
line-item.description: The ftpusers file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001180
line-item.description: All network services daemon files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003700
line-item.description: Inetd and xinetd must be disabled or removed if no network services utilizing them are enabled.

line-item.name: GEN003660
line-item.description: The system must log authentication informational data.

line-item.name: GEN001369
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001060
line-item.description: The system must log successful and unsuccessful access to the root account.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00160
line-item.description: If the system is a firewall, ASET must be used on the system, and the firewall parameters must be set in /usr/aset/asetenv.

line-item.name: GEN000940
line-item.description: The root account's executable search path must be the vendor default and must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN003900
line-item.description: The hosts.lpd file (or equivalent) must not contain a "+" character.

line-item.name: GEN001340
line-item.description: NIS/NIS+/yp files must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN002640
line-item.description: Default system accounts must be disabled or removed.

line-item.name: GEN003790
line-item.description: The services file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002760
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit all administrative, privileged, and security actions.

line-item.name: GEN005760
line-item.description: The NFS export configuration file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00180
line-item.description: The Solaris system Automated Security Enhancement Tool (ASET) configurable parameters in the asetenv file must be correct.

line-item.name: GEN005810
line-item.description: All NFS exported system files and system directories must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN002420
line-item.description: Removable media, remote file systems, and any file system that does not contain approved setuid files must be mounted with the "nosuid" option.

line-item.name: GEN006000
line-item.description: The system must not have a public Instant Messaging (IM) client installed.

line-item.name: GEN002540
line-item.description: All public directories must be group-owned by root or an application group.

line-item.name: GEN006160
line-item.description: The smbpasswd file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN002980
line-item.description: The cron.allow file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005080
line-item.description: The TFTP daemon must operate in secure mode which provides access only to a single directory on the host file system.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00260
line-item.description: The /usr/aset/userlist file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005365
line-item.description: The snmpd.conf file must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN003380
line-item.description: The "at" daemon must not execute programs in, or subordinate to, world-writable directories.

line-item.name: GEN001780
line-item.description: Global initialization files must contain the mesg -n or mesg n commands.

line-item.name: GEN005360
line-item.description: The snmpd.conf files must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN005240
line-item.description: The .Xauthority utility must only permit access to authorized hosts.

line-item.name: GEN001830
line-item.description: All skeleton files (typically in /etc/skel) must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001520
line-item.description: All interactive user's home directories must be group-owned by the home directory owner's primary group.

line-item.name: GEN005100
line-item.description: The TFTP daemon must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001440
line-item.description: All interactive users must be assigned a home directory in the /etc/passwd file.

line-item.name: GEN000760
line-item.description: Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

line-item.name: GEN007780
line-item.description: The system must not have 6to4 enabled.

line-item.name: GEN006300
line-item.description: The /etc/news/nnrp.access (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000440
line-item.description: Successful and unsuccessful logins and logouts must be logged.

line-item.name: GEN005880
line-item.description: The NFS server must not allow remote root access.

line-item.name: GEN008180
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must have mode 0644 (0755 for directories) or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001580
line-item.description: All run control scripts must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN004440
line-item.description: Sendmail logging must not be set to less than nine in the sendmail.cf file.

line-item.name: GEN004560
line-item.description: The SMTP services SMTP greeting must not provide version information.

line-item.name: GEN002990
line-item.description: The cron.allow file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002870
line-item.description: The system must be configured to send audit records to a remote audit server.

line-item.name: GEN007540
line-item.description: The Transparent Inter-Process Communication (TIPC) protocol must be disabled or not installed.

line-item.name: GEN001845
line-item.description: Global initialization files' library search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN005560
line-item.description: The system must be configured with a default gateway for IPv4 if the system uses IPv4, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN001840
line-item.description: All global initialization files' executable search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN005400
line-item.description: The /etc/syslog.conf file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN003245
line-item.description: The at.allow file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000580
line-item.description: The system must require passwords contain a minimum of 14 characters.

line-item.name: GEN003240
line-item.description: The cron.allow file must be owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN000585
line-item.description: The system must enforce compliance of the entire password during authentication.

line-item.name: GEN005610
line-item.description: The system must not have IP forwarding for IPv6 enabled, unless the system is an IPv6 router.

line-item.name: GEN000220
line-item.description: A file integrity tool must be used at least weekly to check for unauthorized file changes, particularly the addition of unauthorized system libraries or binaries, or for unauthorized modification to authorized system libraries or binaries.

line-item.name: GEN003120
line-item.description: Cron and crontab directories must be owned by root or bin.

line-item.name: GEN000340
line-item.description: UIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system accounts.

line-item.name: GEN005580
line-item.description: A system used for routing must not run other network services or applications.

line-item.name: GEN006230
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to use encrypted passwords.

line-item.name: GEN006235
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to not allow guest access to shares.

line-item.name: GEN006620
line-item.description: The system's access control program must be configured to grant or deny system access to specific hosts.

line-item.name: GEN008500
line-item.description: The system must have IEEE 1394 (Firewire) disabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00600
line-item.description: The /etc/zones directory, and its contents, must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002800
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit login, logout, and session initiation.

line-item.name: GEN003400
line-item.description: The "at" directory must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002751
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit account modification.

line-item.name: GEN002750
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit account creation.

line-item.name: GEN002753
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit account termination.

line-item.name: GEN002200
line-item.description: All shell files must be owned by root or bin.

line-item.name: GEN008640
line-item.description: The system must not use removable media as the boot loader.

line-item.name: GEN007980
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the system must use a TLS connection using FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic algorithms.

line-item.name: GEN003624
line-item.description: The system must use a separate filesystem for /tmp (or equivalent).

line-item.name: GEN003623
line-item.description: The system must use a separate file system for the system audit data path.

line-item.name: GEN003620
line-item.description: A separate file system must be used for user home directories (such as /home or equivalent).

line-item.name: GEN001300
line-item.description: Library files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00420
line-item.description: Hidden extended file attributes must not exist on the system.

line-item.name: GEN000590
line-item.description: The system must use a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm for generating account password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN003580
line-item.description: The system must use initial TCP sequence numbers most resistant to sequence number guessing attacks.

line-item.name: GEN000900
line-item.description: The root user's home directory must not be the root directory (/).

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00040
line-item.description: The /etc/security/audit_user file must not define a different auditing level for specific users.

line-item.name: GEN002720
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit failed attempts to access files and programs.

line-item.name: GEN004620
line-item.description: The Sendmail server must have the debug feature disabled.

line-item.name: GEN002500
line-item.description: The sticky bit must be set on all public directories.

line-item.name: GEN006120
line-item.description: The smb.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN003050
line-item.description: Crontab files must be group-owned by root, sys, or the crontab creator's primary group.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00250
line-item.description: The /usr/aset/userlist file must be group-owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN004820
line-item.description: Anonymous FTP must not be active on the system unless authorized.

line-item.name: GEN004980
line-item.description: The FTP daemon must be configured for logging or verbose mode.

line-item.name: GEN005200
line-item.description: X displays must not be exported to the world.

line-item.name: GEN003950
line-item.description: The hosts.lpd (or equivalent) file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000402
line-item.description: The Department of Defense (DoD) login banner must be displayed immediately prior to, or as part of, graphical desktop environment login prompts.

line-item.name: GEN000400
line-item.description: The Department of Defense (DoD) login banner must be displayed immediately prior to, or as part of, console login prompts.

line-item.name: GEN001400
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow (or equivalent) file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN005020
line-item.description: The anonymous FTP account must be configured to use chroot or a similarly isolated environment.

line-item.name: GEN005840
line-item.description: The NFS server must be configured to restrict file system access to local hosts.

line-item.name: GEN005380
line-item.description: If the system is a Network Management System (NMS) server, it must only run the NMS and any software required by the NMS.

line-item.name: GEN000120
line-item.description: System security patches and updates must be installed and up-to-date.

line-item.name: GEN004360
line-item.description: The alias file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN001901
line-item.description: Local initialization files' library search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001900
line-item.description: All local initialization files' executable search paths must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN001270
line-item.description: System log files must not have extended ACLs, except as needed to support authorized software.

line-item.name: GEN003470
line-item.description: The at.allow file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN001570
line-item.description: All files and directories contained in user home directories must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN000300
line-item.description: All accounts on the system must have unique user or account names.

line-item.name: GEN001470
line-item.description: The /etc/passwd file must not contain password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN002752
line-item.description: The audit system must be configured to audit account disabling.

line-item.name: GEN001475
line-item.description: The /etc/group file must not contain any group password hashes.

line-item.name: GEN006270
line-item.description: The /etc/news/hosts.nntp file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001366
line-item.description: The /etc/hosts file must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN004410
line-item.description: Files executed through a mail aliases file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys, and must reside within a directory group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN006280
line-item.description: The /etc/news/hosts.nntp.nolimit (or equivalent) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008540
line-item.description: The system's local firewall must implement a deny-all, allow-by-exception policy.

line-item.name: GEN005538
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not allow rhosts RSA authentication.

line-item.name: GEN005539
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must not allow compression or must only allow compression after successful authentication.

line-item.name: GEN004000
line-item.description: The traceroute file must have mode 0700 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN008380
line-item.description: A root kit check tool must be run on the system at least weekly.

line-item.name: GEN001870
line-item.description: Local initialization files must be group-owned by the user's primary group or root.

line-item.name: GEN005536
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

line-item.name: GEN003270
line-item.description: The cron.deny file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN008440
line-item.description: Automated file system mounting tools must not be enabled unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN004380
line-item.description: The alias file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN001800
line-item.description: All skeleton files (typically those in /etc/skel) must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003980
line-item.description: The traceroute command must be group-owned by sys, bin, or root.

line-item.name: GEN001610
line-item.description: Run control scripts' lists of preloaded libraries must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN003820
line-item.description: The rsh daemon must not be running.

line-item.name: GEN003825
line-item.description: The rshd service must not be installed.

line-item.name: GEN006575
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must use FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashes for validating file contents.

line-item.name: GEN006571
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must be configured to verify extended attributes.

line-item.name: GEN006570
line-item.description: The file integrity tool must be configured to verify ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN008160
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN006400
line-item.description: The Network Information System (NIS) protocol must not be used.

line-item.name: GEN004700
line-item.description: The Sendmail service must not have the wizard backdoor active.

line-item.name: GEN003090
line-item.description: Crontab files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN005420
line-item.description: The /etc/syslog.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN003300
line-item.description: The at.deny file must not be empty if it exists.

line-item.name: GEN001190
line-item.description: All network services daemon files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN003360
line-item.description: The "at" daemon must not execute group-writable or world-writable programs.

line-item.name: GEN001720
line-item.description: All global initialization files must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00100
line-item.description: The /etc/security/audit_user file must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003650
line-item.description: All local file systems must employ journaling or another mechanism ensuring file system consistency.

line-item.name: GEN008680
line-item.description: If the system boots from removable media, it must be stored in a safe or similarly secured container.

line-item.name: GEN001290
line-item.description: All manual page files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN003200
line-item.description: The cron.deny file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002719
line-item.description: The audit system must alert the SA in the event of an audit processing failure.

line-item.name: GEN002718
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00580
line-item.description: The /etc/zones directory, and its contents, must not be group- or world-writable.

line-item.name: GEN002715
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN002717
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must have mode 0750 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN002716
line-item.description: System audit tool executables must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN003780
line-item.description: The services file must have mode 0444 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005770
line-item.description: The NFS exports configuration file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN005800
line-item.description: All NFS-exported system files and system directories must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00200
line-item.description: The asetenv file YPCHECK variable must be set to true when NIS+ is configured.

line-item.name: GEN002020
line-item.description: All .rhosts, .shosts, or host.equiv files must only contain trusted host-user pairs.

line-item.name: GEN003000
line-item.description: Cron must not execute group-writable or world-writable programs.

line-item.name: GEN005375
line-item.description: The snmpd.conf file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001120
line-item.description: The system must not permit root logins using remote access programs such as SSH.

line-item.name: GEN003960
line-item.description: The traceroute command owner must be root.

line-item.name: GEN005501
line-item.description: The SSH client must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

line-item.name: GEN005500
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

line-item.name: GEN001820
line-item.description: All skeleton files and directories (typically in /etc/skel) must be owned by bin.

line-item.name: GEN000750
line-item.description: The system must require at least four characters be changed between the old and new passwords during a password change.

line-item.name: GEN005505
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

line-item.name: GEN005504
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must only listen on management network addresses unless authorized for uses other than management.

line-item.name: GEN004580
line-item.description: The system must not use .forward files.

line-item.name: GEN005506
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured to not use Cipher-Block Chaining (CBC) ciphers.

line-item.name: GEN000452
line-item.description: The system must display the date and time of the last successful account login upon login.

line-item.name: GEN006330
line-item.description: The /etc/news/passwd.nntp file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN001430
line-item.description: The /etc/shadow file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002320
line-item.description: Audio devices must have mode 0660 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003522
line-item.description: The kernel core dump data directory must have mode 0700 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005190
line-item.description: The .Xauthority files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN002440
line-item.description: The owner, group-owner, mode, ACL, and location of files with the setgid bit set must be documented using site-defined procedures.

line-item.name: GEN007880
line-item.description: The system must not send IPv6 ICMP redirects.

line-item.name: GEN005180
line-item.description: All .Xauthority files must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005570
line-item.description: The system must be configured with a default gateway for IPv6 if the system uses IPv6, unless the system is a router.

line-item.name: GEN002960
line-item.description: Access to the cron utility must be controlled using the cron.allow and/or cron.deny file(s).

line-item.description: IP forwarding for IPv4 must not be enabled, unless the system is a router.

line-item.description: The system must prevent the root account from directly logging in except from the system console.

line-item.description: Network analysis tools must not be installed.

line-item.description: The system must not have the finger service active.

line-item.description: The system must require passwords to contain at least one numeric character.

line-item.description: The root user must not own the logon session for an application requiring a continuous display.

line-item.description: The ftpusers file must contain account names not allowed to use FTP.

line-item.description: All global initialization files must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.description: The portmap or rpcbind service must not be running unless needed.

line-item.description: The .rhosts file must not be supported in PAM.

line-item.description: The system must be checked for extraneous device files at least weekly.

line-item.description: The /usr/aset/masters/uid_aliases must be empty.

line-item.description: The /etc/syslog.conf file must have mode 0640 or less permissive.

line-item.description: A file integrity baseline must be created and maintained.

line-item.description: The FTPS/FTP service on the system must be configured with the Department of Defense (DoD) login banner.

line-item.description: The system must not have accounts configured with blank or null passwords.

line-item.description: All shell files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.description: System BIOS or system controllers supporting password protection must have administrator accounts/passwords configured, and no others.

line-item.description: Device files used for backup must only be readable and/or writable by root or the backup user.

line-item.name: GEN002280
line-item.description: Device files and directories must only be writable by users with a system account or as configured by the vendor.

line-item.name: GEN006080
line-item.description: The Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT) must be restricted to the local host or require SSL.

line-item.name: GEN004510
line-item.description: The SMTP service log file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN002860
line-item.description: Audit logs must be rotated daily.

line-item.name: GEN008200
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP TLS certificate authority file and/or directory (as appropriate) must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN006580
line-item.description: The system must use an access control program.

line-item.name: GEN001850
line-item.description: Global initialization files' lists of preloaded libraries must contain only absolute paths.

line-item.name: GEN006200
line-item.description: The smbpasswd file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN005000
line-item.description: Anonymous FTP accounts must not have a functional shell.

line-item.name: GEN005550
line-item.description: The SSH daemon must be configured with the Department of Defense (DoD) login banner.

line-item.name: GEN003521
line-item.description: The kernel core dump data directory must be group-owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN003520
line-item.description: The kernel core dump data directory must be owned by root.

line-item.name: GEN003523
line-item.description: The kernel core dump data directory must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN003250
line-item.description: The cron.allow file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN000595
line-item.description: The password hashes stored on the system must have been generated using a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm.

line-item.name: GEN003255
line-item.description: The at.deny file must not have an extended ACL.

line-item.name: GEN000600
line-item.description: The system must require passwords to contain at least one uppercase alphabetic character.

line-item.name: GEN001200
line-item.description: All system command files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003480
line-item.description: The at.deny file must be owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN006220
line-item.description: The smb.conf file must use the hosts option to restrict access to Samba.

line-item.name: GEN003845
line-item.description: The rexecd service must not be installed.

line-item.name: GEN006225
line-item.description: Samba must be configured to use an authentication mechanism other than "share."

line-item.name: GEN003840
line-item.description: The rexec daemon must not be running.

line-item.name: GEN007950
line-item.description: The system must not respond to ICMPv6 echo requests sent to a broadcast address.

line-item.name: GEN008820
line-item.description: The system package management tool must not automatically obtain updates.

line-item.name: GEN007700
line-item.description: The IPv6 protocol handler must not be bound to the network stack unless needed.

line-item.name: GEN004680
line-item.description: The SMTP service must not have the VRFY feature active.

line-item.name: GEN008100
line-item.description: If the system is using LDAP for authentication or account information, the LDAP configuration file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN004370
line-item.description: The aliases file must be group-owned by root, sys, smmsp, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN001680
line-item.description: All system start-up files must be group-owned by root, sys, or bin.

line-item.name: GEN003730
line-item.description: The inetd.conf file must be group-owned by root, bin, or sys.

line-item.name: GEN002230
line-item.description: All shell files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN003320
line-item.description: Default system accounts (with the exception of root) must not be listed in the at.allow file or must be included in the at.deny file if the at.allow file does not exist.

line-item.name: GEN000500
line-item.description: Graphical desktop environments provided by the system must automatically lock after 15 minutes of inactivity and the system must require users to re-authenticate to unlock the environment.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00120
line-item.description: The ASET master files must be located in the /usr/aset/masters directory.

line-item.name: GEN001700
line-item.description: System start-up files must only execute programs owned by a privileged UID or an application.

line-item.name: GEN006420
line-item.description: NIS maps must be protected through hard-to-guess domain names.

line-item.name: GEN007920
line-item.description: The system must not forward IPv6 source-routed packets.

line-item.name: GEN002730
line-item.description: The audit system must alert the SA when the audit storage volume approaches its capacity.

line-item.name: GEN005280
line-item.description: The system must not have the UUCP service active.

line-item.name: GEN002040
line-item.description: There must be no .rhosts, .shosts, hosts.equiv, or shosts.equiv files on the system.

line-item.name: GEN003020
line-item.description: Cron must not execute programs in, or subordinate to, world-writable directories.

line-item.name: GEN002120
line-item.description: The /etc/shells (or equivalent) file must exist.

line-item.name: GEN003740
line-item.description: The inetd.conf file must have mode 0440 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN000000-SOL00220
line-item.description: The /usr/aset/userlist file must exist.

line-item.name: GEN003745
line-item.description: The inetd.conf file must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN005350
line-item.description: Management Information Base (MIB) files must not have extended ACLs.

line-item.name: GEN001140
line-item.description: System files and directories must not have uneven access permissions.

line-item.name: GEN000280
line-item.description: Direct logins must not be permitted to shared, default, application, or utility accounts.

line-item.name: GEN001020
line-item.description: The root account must not be used for direct logins.

line-item.name: GEN001373
line-item.description: The /etc/nsswitch.conf file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

line-item.name: GEN003940
line-item.description: The hosts.lpd (or equivalent) must have mode 0644 or less permissive.
